/** * Open a URL and return an InputStream to it * if acceptGzipEncoding == true, use GZIPEncoding to * compress communication. *

* The caller is responsible to close the returned InputStream not to cause * resource leaks. * @param url the input URL to be read * @param acceptGzipEncoding whether to accept Gzip encoding * @param timeout * @return an {@link InputStream} of response * @throws IOException due to an error opening the URL */
